layout.appNameVersion: Web interface for managing the Platform and registries. Version

text.enteredSystemSignatureKeys: Entered system signature keys and user's QES keys will be applied to the current registry settings.
text.enteredCertificatesVerification: Entered CA certificates for system signature keys and QES keys verification will be applied to the current registry settings.
text.everythingReadyCreateRegistry: Everything is ready for the registry creation. You can check your entered data and press "Create registry".

text.managementSubsystemDeployed: Geodata management subsystem is deployed for the current registry.
text.managementSubsystemNotDeployed: Geodata management subsystem is not deployed for the current registry.
text.impossibleChangeAfterCreate: Once the registry is created, it will not be possible to change these settings.

text.pageDescriptionGlobal:
The Registries Platform supports the ability to apply digital signatures to registry data and subsequently verify its integrity. 

 This feature is currently implemented only for Ukraine using libraries certified by Ukrainian data protection authorities. Implementation of these functions for other regions requires adaptation according to the legal requirements of each specific region and domain.

The Registries Platform supports the ability to apply digital signatures to registry data and subsequently verify its integrity. 

 This feature is currently implemented only for Ukraine using libraries certified by Ukrainian data protection authorities. Implementation of these functions for other regions requires adaptation according to the legal requirements of each specific region and domain.

awsInstanceVolumeType.label: System disk type of an AWS EC2-instance

instanceVolumeSize.label: Size of the virtual machine's system disk (GB)

text.openShiftClusterIsDeployed: OpenShift cluster deployed on AWS infrastructure. Learn more about valid virtual machine parameter values in OpenShift system requirements.
text.immediatelyApplyChanges: If you need to immediately apply changes to the parameters of virtual machines (disk type and size), you must first disable the registry before making the change.
text.contactPlatformAdministrator: If you need to edit parameters, contact the Platform administrator.
text.rangeOfValidSizeValuesVolumeSize: Allowed values: 50 - 200 GB, but no less than the current one ({instanceVolumeSize} GB).
text.validValuesNotLessCurrent: Allowed values: 50 - 200 GB, but no less than the current one ({instanceVolumeSize} GB).
text.maximumPriceAWS: Max price of an AWS EC2-instance (per hour):

instanceVolumeSize.label: Size of the virtual machine's system disk (GB)

vSphereInstanceCPUCount.label: Number of vCPUs in virtual machine

vSphereInstanceCoresPerCPUCount.label: Number of cores per vCPU in virtual machine

text.openShiftClusterDeployed: OpenShift cluster deployed on VSphere infrastructure. Learn more about valid virtual machine parameter values in OpenShift system requirements.
text.immediatelyApplyChanges: If you need to immediately apply changes to the parameters of virtual machines (disk type and size), you must first disable the registry before making the change.
text.contactPlatformAdministrator: If you need to edit parameters, contact the Platform administrator.
text.rangeOfValidSizeValuesVolumeSize: Allowed values: 50 - 200 GB, but no less than the current one ({instanceVolumeSize} GB).

storageDays.label: Retention time (days)
storageDays.description: The value must be a positive number and cannot be less than 1 day. We recommend setting the retention time to be longer than the interval between backups.

cronExpression.label: Backup retention schedule of S3 object replications
cronExpression.description: If you want to set a schedule different from the default one, please enter the schedule value in cron format, or specify the default UTC value:

text.abilitySpecifySchedule: The ability to specify the schedule for creating backup copies of the registry and the time of their storage.
text.replicationBackupRun: Next S3 object replication backup run (UTC)
text.storageLocationBackup: Backup storage location for S3 object replications
text.defaultValuesSpecifiedDeployment: The default values specified during registry deployment are used.

maxFileSize.label: Max file size for upload, MB

maxTotalFileSize.label: Max total upload size for file group, MB

text.managementOfUploadingFiles: Management of restrictions on uploading files of digital documents to the registry by users and business processes.
text.administrativeRestrictionsMaximumRequest: Administrative restrictions apply within the 100MB maximum upload request limits set at the Platform level.
text.maximumSizeForDownloadValidation: Valid characters: "0-9", ".". The value cannot exceed 4 characters in length.
text.valueFormat: Values entered, read in MB, can be a decimal fraction with a dot as a separator.
text.valueLimit: The value cannot exceed the limit set at the system level. The limit applies to files that are uploaded by users and business processes. Additional limits can be set at the level of individual file fields when modeling UI forms.
text.valueGroupLimit: The value cannot exceed a limit set at the system level. The limit applies to a group of files that are uploaded by users through the UI form's file fields.
text.fileCannotExceedTotalSize: The maximum file size value cannot exceed the maximum total size of the file group to be uploaded.
text.valueMaximumSize: The value is used to define the “File Maximum Size” parameter in the File component in the UI form modeler.
text.valueGroupMaximumSize: The value is used to define the “Maximum total size” parameter in the File component in the UI form modeler.
text.maxTotalSize: Max. total size of the group of files to upload

text.additionalExternalConfiguration: Additional external configuration is required outside the OpenShift cluster and registry.

name.label: Name
name.description: Allowed characters are "a-z", "-". The name cannot exceed 12 characters in length.

text.nameMustBeUnique: Attention! The name must be unique and cannot be changed after the registry is created!
text.descriptionContainOfficialName: The description may contain the official name of the registry or its purpose.
text.impossibleChangeAfterDeploy: Once the registry is created, it will be impossible to change the deployment mode of the registry.
text.localizationDescription: Localization settings for the interfaces of the following registry resources:
text.localizationWarning: The language will be changed after applying the change request.

text.verificationDataKEP: Verification of data from users' QES in EDR occurs only if the current registry is integrated with EDR through Trembita SEI SEIR.
text.checkPresenceActiveRecord: Check presence of an active record in EDR for business users
text.possibleToUseAuthenticationWidget: It is possible to use a custom authentication widget or configure integration with id.gov.ua.

maxPoolSize.description: The value should be greater than 0

text.addIndividualComponents: You can add individual components to the registry.
text.applyChangesImmediately: If you want to apply the changes immediately, you need to trigger a data model update.
text.specifyValueAndDimension: Specify the value and dimension. For example, '100m' for CPU (milli-cores) and '400Mi' for RAM (mebibyte).

text.settingConnectionPlatformMailServer: Setting up connection to the platform mail server
text.configuringConnectionExternalServer: Configuring SMTP connection to an external mail server

authURL.label: Link

keyName.label: Choose the encryption key

text.settingAccessUsers: Setting access for users to the User Portal using QES of an individual.
text.allowAccessFromKEP: Allow access with QES of an individual
text.singleIdentityDescription: Set up the user authentication mode based solely on the values of the Tax ID and full name from the digital signature. The business entity identifier will be excluded from comparison.
text.singleIdentityDescriptionPopup: Once enabled, the system will consider different types of user keys (QES) (individual, individual entrepreneur, legal representative) as identification for a single account in the system provided the Tax ID and full name match. Configured roles and access to business processes will be preserved.
text.possibleUseAuthenticationWidget: You can use your own authentication widget or configure integration with id.gov.ua.
text.presenceSelfRegistrationBusiness: Involves a pre-modeled self-registration business process in the registry.
text.notAbleCompleteTasksSelfRegistration: If disabled, users who have started the self-registration process will not be able to complete their tasks if they are modeled.

text.registryTrembitaDescription: To enable external systems to access the registry via Trembita, specify the IP addresses of Trembita from which access to the registry's SOAP API will be allowed.

requirements.point2: 2. Contain at least one lowercase letter.
requirements.point3: 3. Contain at least one uppercase letter.
requirements.point5: 5. Contain at least one special symbol: &#64, #, $, %, ^, &, +, =.

bucketName.label: Bucket name
bucketName.description: Name length must be between 3 and 63 characters. Allowed characters are "a-z", "0-9", ".", "-"

name.label: Service request name
name.description: Valid characters are "a-z", numbers "0-9", "-". The name cannot exceed 32 characters in length. It must start and end with letters or numbers and be unique.

url.label: Integration point link to...
url.description: Allowed characters are "A-Z", "a-z", numbers "0-9", "-", "/". The link must be unique.

text.providePublicAccess: You can provide public access to this registry's data (master). A separate client registry user will be created in the master registry to access the master registry.
text.integrationPoint: Integration point (path to the public search query)
text.integrationPointDescription: Allowed characters are "A-Z", "a-z", numbers "0-9", "-", "/". The link must be unique.

text.grantAccessAgainLater: You can grant access again later.

text.createdRegistryInAdvance: If the registry is not in the list, it must be created in advance.
text.accessPasswordWillBeCreated: An access password will be created automatically. It can be checked after configuring access to the master registry.

text.gerrit: Gerrit is free software with a web interface integrated with the Git distributed version control system for collaborative source code inspection. Gerrit was developed by a Google developer, Sean Pearce, for the development of the Android operating system.
text.jenkins: Jenkins is an open source software system in Java designed to support the process of continuous software integration. Forked in 2008 from the Hudson project owned by Oracle, its main author is Kosuke Kawaguchi. Distributed under the MIT license.

title.Сервіс інспекції та зберігання змін регл: Registry changes inspection and storage service (Gerrit).
title.API документація сервісу управління дани: API documentation of the registry data management service (Swagger).
API documentation of the registry data management service (Swagger) for public data.
title.Веб-інтерфейс моделювання звітів (Redash: Web interface for report modeling (Redash Admin).
title.Веб-інтерфейс управління виконанням бізн: Web interface for managing the execution of business processes (business process administration).
Web interface for managing the execution of business processes (business process administration).
title.Веб-інтерфейс перегляду даних реєстру (p: Web interface for viewing registry data (pgAdmin).
title.Веб-інтерфейс моніторингу черг повідомле: Web interface for message queue monitoring (Kafka UI).

description.Клієнтський вебдодаток для адмініструван: Client web application for registry administration. The interface allows you to perform the necessary configuration of the registry without having deep programming skills.
description.Програмний інструмент, що дозволяє керув: A software tool that allows you to manage versions of components and configurations.
description.Програмний комплекс, що забезпечує автом: A software complex that provides automation for the life cycle of the Registry Regulations deployment.
description.Веб-інтерфейс для перегляду API-документ: Web interface for viewing the API documentation of the registry data management subsystem for further use when building interaction through typical connector extensions in business processes.
Web interface for viewing the Registry Data Management Subsystem API documentation for public data for further use when building interactions with unauthenticated users and external systems.
description.Користувацький інтерфейс для створення т: User interface for creating and configuring analytical reports and dashboards.
description.Користувацький інтерфейс для перегляду с: User interface for viewing the execution status and managing registry business processes.
description.Користувацький інтерфейс для перегляду д: User interface for viewing business process data and scheme of the data model.
description.Веб-інтерфейс для перегляду черг повідом: Web interface for viewing message queues and messages in them.
description.Користувацький інтерфейс для адмініструв: Web interface for geo data administration.

description.Клієнтський веб-додаток для отримання ад: Web app for citizens. Allows to get administrative and information services.
description.Клієнтський веб-додаток для надання адмі: Web app for officers. Allows to provide administrative and information services.

nexusTime.label: Storage time (days)
nexusTime.description: The value can only be a positive number and not less than 1 day. It is recommended to set the storage time to be longer than the period between copy creation.

controlPlaneTime.label: Storage time (days)
controlPlaneTime.description: The value can only be a positive number and not less than 1 day. It is recommended to set the storage time to be longer than the period between copy creation.

managementTime.label: Storage time (days)
managementTime.description: The value can only be a positive number and not less than 1 day. It is recommended to set the storage time to be longer than the period between copy creation.

monitoringTime.label: Storage time (days)
monitoringTime.description: The value can only be a positive number and not less than 1 day. It is recommended to set the storage time to be longer than the period between copy creation.

text.addedUsersKeysDescription: Entered user's QES keys will be applied to the Platform settings.
text.addedUsersCertificatesDescription: Added AKCC certificates for checking users' QES keys will be applied to the Platform settings.

text.setAdditionDnsForService: Setting up additional DNS names for the user and role management service (Keycloak). For additional DNS, it is necessary to perform external configuration of records at the domain name registrar.
text.domainIsUsedByRegistry: The domain "{existHostname}" is used by one of the registries. Please change the domain in the relevant registry to another before removing this keycloak DNS.
text.clusterSettingsHostnameDescription: The name length cannot exceed 63 characters. Allowed characters are “a-z”, “.”, “-”, “_”.

text.linkToSelectedRegistry: The selected demo registry will be referenced in the documentation.
text.previousRegistryNoFound: The previous registry («{demoRegistryName}») is not found.

text.banner: Settings will be applied after submitting the change request.
text.platformDescription: Selected images are applied to the administrative control plane.
text.localizationDescription: Ability to select a language for the Control Plane interface.
text.previousRegistryNoFound: The previous registry ("{demoRegistryName}") is not found.

title.Сервіс інспекції та зберігання змін конф: Service for viewing and storing configuration changes (Gerrit).

description.Інтерфейс користувача, доступний із веб-: The user interface accessible from a web browser. Platform administrators can use the OpenShift web console to visualize, view and manage the content or resources of the OpenShift Cluster, Platform and registries.
description.Програмний інструмент, що дозволяє керув: A software tool that allows you to manage versions of components and configurations. Tightly integrated with the Git distributed version control system and with this tool, Platform administrators have the ability to view all code and configuration modifications using a web browser and approve or reject these changes.
description.Програмний комплекс, що забезпечує автом: A software complex that provides automation in the life cycle of the Platform and Registries. Performs the actual deployment of the Registry, configuration, updates and many other automated tasks in the Platform.
description.Центральне сховище артефактів, компонент: A central repository of artifacts, components and their dependencies that make up each individual subsystem and the Platform as a whole. Saving the Platform artifacts.

title.Сервіс управління користувачами та ролям: Service for user and role management (Keycloak).
title.Веб-інтерфейс перегляду журналу подій Пл: Service for viewing Platform event logs (Kibana).
title.Веб-інтерфейс управління та моніторингу: Interface for managing and viewing the Service Mesh (Kiali).

description.Компонент, що забезпечує адміністраторів: A component that allows you to configure, check and analyze the service-mesh of the Platform, as well as visualize the traffic inside the Platform.
description.Сервіс, що використовується для монітори: A service used for query monitoring and fault analysis of microservices-based distributed systems. Allows you to perform component dependency analysis, fault analysis, transaction monitoring, and Platform performance optimization.
description.Інструмент для безпечного управління сек: A tool for securely managing secrets and protecting access to confidential information in computing environments.

title.Центральний сервіс управління секретами: A central service for managing the secrets of the Platform (Vault).

description.Забезпечення операції Auto unseal для пі: Provision of Auto unseal operation for secret management and encryption subsystems.
description.S3-сумісне сховище даних, що забезпечує: S3-compatible data storage that provides reliable and scalable storage for backup copies of the Platform and registries.
